Prioritize or reschedule. 2. **Saturday Deadline** â€” Byron expects survey synthesis deck AND Innovation Sprint plan by Sat 1/24. 3. **Promotion Details** â€” Larry Lane marked urgent (!!!) â€” needed for 11:00 meeting. --- > [!danger]- Overdue > ```tasks > not done > due before 2026-01-22 > short mode > limit 5 > ``` > [!warning]- Due Today > ```tasks > not done > due on 2026-01-22 > short mode > ``` --- ## Workspace ### Deep Work - ### Meeting Notes **Martin 1:1** - Was able to catch up with Arch Summit videos - Project Polaris - Richard Hoyland - Meeting in NYC to align with Associate Hub - Mapping capabilities - Create a Monday.com card - My action item - Provide a Probabtion period notes to HR (martin to create a draft) - Martin action: Setup Technical Design Authority - MENA - review their setup - My updates - GEA site - https://lockton.sharepoint.com/sites/GlobalEnterpriseArchitecture787 - Showed the ArcKit concept - https://github.com/tractorjuice/arc-kit - file:///Users/karthik/Documents/3%20-%20Resources/Vaults/L2Brain/ea-toolkit/dashboard.html# - -- for his bio journal - Travel to London - He commutes door to door 1.5 hours - 1 mile walk each end to end - get off London bridge - Lives Epston - south of London - border of I25 ### Hackathon Winners Next Steps - Showcase the innovation board ### Promotions _ Jenna Ottemeier 1. Larry Lane -> $166k to $175k (move diff from Mulesoft admin budget $180k) 2. Mark Burtson -> $137k to $146k (move into Megan's role) 3. Brooke McFarland -> $124K -> $130K -> Move into Mark's role - open up her role 4. | | - I need Puru to be promoted too - Naveen Jannifer Bryant - Excited to help me with the Innovation Sprint - 3 person committee Bryant, Shanna and I - New building Associate Experience - ask my direct reports for input - Relocation impact - what is the monetary impact - Add this to the market adjustment - ### Autocert Available - Brian Roberts & Bocanegra - Leaning towards Injala - Megan shared that there will be IT involvement - There is an AI extraction - Laurel not keen on IT - Launching Injala by Jul - Claude reached out to ### Invoicing Brainstorm Rob Mayo, Amy Guthrie, Brian Bonecutter, Nandini G, Cami Tritsch, Martin Hershy, Jessica Burche **Rob Mayo** - We create invoices in Soluto - Receivables will go into Sagitta - match the invoice number - Cash app can match the money back to invoice app - 60-90 day turnaround Could this work for P&C? **Amy Guthrie** - 6 BUs - Founders is looking to something for the clients ASAP - What other options? **Martin Hershy** - Client Hub - Invoice creation - Invoice delivery - more important - Portal access - real time access to information - important - Payment portal (less of a need) - Dissemnitation of payments - Custom front end - branding - Build custom integrations - APIs - Contract terms automation - Rob priority - installments - calendar of delivery Features - Client facing - Sagitta retirement? - Nexsure retirement? Alternatives - ePay Policy - Affinity & personal lines - Ascend - PRS - Comulate - doesnt do delivery *Note: P&C doesnt really have an AMS - * Next Step - Soluto demo and pricing - Risk requirements - Martin - Hub - Matt Smith, Molly & Phil - Forrester More to come - Direct billing - PWP - Revenue Leakage ### Capture - --- ## Logbook - [x] [!!! Larry Lane - promotion details](things:///show?id=KpxRP5noWu2BUBj1Noxno7) - [x] [Larry, Mark & Brooke promotion](things:///show?id=Gxo7NeMN2GRAmBVyTGFw4j) Confirm with Megan - salaries to communicate
